Detailed Description

cvmx_tosp::_int_ctrl_status

This register reports SPI status for various conditions.

When a given enable bit is set, the corresponding status bit will be set when the condition occurs. All status bits are cleared on a read access.

To read the state of the enables without clearing the status bits, the enable states are aliased in the TOSP()_INT_CTRL_STATUS_SHADOW register.

Note that no interrupts are generated when these status bits are set.
